page.title: 11Law and Order.
page.content: The local Constable is based at the Police Station in Park Lane, Middleham -Served in the force 13yrs; the last 2 at Middleham. Typical day: 9am. Visit Leyburn Police Station to speak with the Sergeant. Patrol villages in Ford Fiesta Police car. Stop vehicles & check driving documents. Assist people whenever able. Have lunch; visit pubs, possibly the School; foot patrol then off_duty. Beat approx 15 miles by 6 miles. Carries handcuffs,radio, truncheon and pocket book. Most difficult tasks this year: Picketing duty during the Miners' Strike.He enjoys meeting people; dislikes shift work. Ambition: To complete 30 years in the Force. In the future he forsees more use of computers and an end of village based Constables.
